title: The Adventures of Oscar Young: The Counselor of Light

story.text: Oscar discovers an ancient book beneath the floorboards of his counseling office. It imbues him with the power to absorb and alleviate the emotional turmoil of others.
Tested his new powers by helping a despondent student find hope and direction, resolving her academic and personal crises.
Oscar intervenes in a heated argument in the park, using his powers to calm both parties and mediate a peaceful resolution.
Word spreads about a mysterious healer in town. Oscar keeps his identity secret, but continues his mission at a community center.
An encounter with a skeptical journalist who tries to unveil his secret. Oscar manages to convince him of the importance of his anonymity for his work.
A major crisis ensues when a local factoryâ€™s dispute almost turns violent. Using his unique abilities, Oscar diffuses the tension and helps negotiate an agreement.
Oscar holds a free counseling session in the park, helping numerous people find peace and closure. His legend as the Counselor of Light grows.

ending: As the sun set on a grateful city, Oscar felt a deep satisfaction in his heart, knowing his powers had brought hope where there was once despair.
moral: True heroism lies in compassion and the courage to heal others.
